name: Calm Sea
description:
Calm Sea it's a game, that I made during the one week Game Jam - #ZostanWDomuRobGry.

Movement: WASD

Patch holes: G

Sounds used in game:

-"Ambience, Seaside Waves, Close, A.wav" by InspectorJ (www.jshaw.co.uk) of Freesound.org
-"Rain noises" (When a hole appears )Freesound - FX, https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCa6gliHoxeu5faOMMN2qqo+
-"Rain noises" (In background) pulswelle, https://freesound.org/people/pulswelle/
